Parsing quality planning, quality control, quality improvement with the man Lloyd Provost #cfsummit. Love it!

Culture of awesome is not enough in ed opportunities to learn. Need social engagement. #cfsummit
Students know they can't get by w/o inward facing culture of education. They'll create it if it's not provided. #cfsummit

Only way learning happens: change in thought or action by the student. Can't project learning outward #cfsummit

#cfsummit chat should be part of #edchat - expanding the audience
